SB_ID, SB_CODE, SB_SPEC, SB_CUBE, CODE, AUDITOR, M_DT, WORKGROUP, LAYER, MSIZE, HEIGHT, BLOCKNUMBER, SQUARE, BELOWGRADEBLOCK, BELOWGRADESQUARE, COMMENT, C_DT, U_DT, STATE, C_ID, PRICE, SUM,
